title: Strategies for Enhancing Student Engagement in Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: An intensive short-term course for current practitioners to enhance practical competencies in the science field, conducted in a blended learning environment utilizing digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can achieve over 85% participation rates in online activities
Learners can perform meaningful interactions at least three times per week through peer assessments and discussion activities
Learners can utilize online learning materials at over 90% efficiency to solve given science problems
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
